item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: A quick introduction
item.description: Introduction I am Peter Moravec, studying my Masters in Financial Analysis at London Business School

item.title: A quick introduction
item.description: Introduction I am Peter Moravec, studying my Masters in Financial Analysis at London Business School What I love My biggest passion in life is everything automotive. I have been into cars since I can remember. Going on a road trip through the mountains is my favourite leisure activity

item.title: Report
item.description: R Markdown Including Plots Gilead to acquire Immunomedics for $21bn By Peter Moravec (London Business School) 14/09/2020 Overview of the deal Acquirer: Gilead Sciences Inc. Target: Immunomedics Inc. Estimated value: $21bn Announcement date: Acquirer Advisors: Lazard and Morgan Stanley Target Advisors: Centerview Partners and BofA Securities Gilead Sciences, the company, known for its Covid-19 treatment Remdesivir has decided to branch out further into cancer treatment by agreeing to acquire Immunomedics.

item.title: Session 6: Homework 3
item.description: IMDB ratings: Differences between directors The null hypothesis: Mean IMDB Ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton are the same (p-value => 0.05) The alternative hypothesis: Mean IMDB Ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton are not the same (p-value < 0.05) Replicating plot of confidence intervals for the mean ratings of the two directors movies <- read_csv(here::here("data", "movies.csv")) glimpse(movies) ## Rows: 2,961 ## Columns: 11 ## $ title <chr> "Avatar", "Titanic", "Jurassic World", "The Ave.
